attributes.action: Keep open air pools, golf & tennis clubs open in the event of a third lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
*Very few or nil cases of C-19 identified at golf, swim & tennis facilities 
*Most users travel to above facilities via bicycle, car or on foot
*Most facilities require users to change outdoors. Indoor areas cleaned with chlorine disinfectant which kills C-19
*Lakes are exempt but reservoirs are not putting OW swimmers at risk swimming unsupervised 
*Repeated closure of facilities equals loss of livelihoods, Poor population health & future loss of facilities
attributes.background:
*Social distancing is maintained by default due to rules of the 3 sports
*UKGov encourages outdoor exercise. This is not just for those who can to walk, run & cycle
*COVID-19 guidelines have been complied with to date

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow open-air swimming pools, lidos & lakes to open in a new Covid-19 lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555079

Exempt outdoor tennis from closure due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557658

Allow golf to be played with appropriate safety measures: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167
